tokens.resolved_gloss: properly, to turn aside from the road (for a lodging or any other purpose), i.e. sojourn (as a guest); also to shrink, fear (as in a strange place); also to gather for hostility (as afraid)
tokens.translation: properly, to turn aside from the road (for a lodging or any other purpose), i.e. sojourn (as a guest); also to shrink, fear (as in a strange place); also to gather for hostility (as afraid)

tokens.resolved_gloss: a house (in the greatest variation of applications, especially family, etc.)
tokens.translation: a house (in the greatest variation of applications, especially family, etc.)

tokens.resolved_gloss: to turn aside (especially for lodging); hence to be a foreigner, strange, profane; specifically (active participle) to commit adultery
tokens.translation: to turn aside (especially for lodging); hence to be a foreigner, strange, profane; specifically (active participle) to commit adultery

tokens.resolved_gloss: properly, to plait or interpenetrate, i.e. (literally) to weave or (generally) to fabricate; figuratively, to plot or contrive (usually in a malicious sense); hence (from the mental effort) to think, regard, value, compute
tokens.translation: properly, to plait or interpenetrate, i.e. (literally) to weave or (generally) to fabricate; figuratively, to plot or contrive (usually in a malicious sense); hence (from the mental effort) to think, regard, value, compute

tokens.resolved_gloss: strange, in a variety of degrees and applications (foreign, non-relative, adulterous, different, wonderful)

tokens.resolved_gloss: to exist, i.e. be or become, come to pass (always emphatic, and not a mere copula or auxiliary)

tokens.resolved_gloss: an eye (literally or figuratively); by analogy, a fountain (as the eye of the landscape)
